Text:
How do you burn this on one DVD? It says that i don''t have enough space on te (empty) disk.

Can someone help me?
You either need a dual layer DVD(8.5gb) or split it onto two regular DVDs. You will need some program such as NERO to split the movie.
Thank you for the up. You can use too ImageBurn.Please seed.
or you can use 2 programs. one that mounts the image as a drive and then rip your own version from that.
